sections.heading: Truck, defined.Truck means a motor vehicle that is designed, used, or maintained primarily for the transportation of property or designated as a truck by the manufacturer
sections.text: SourceLaws 2005, LB 274, ยง 56;Laws 2007, LB286, ยง 31.AnnotationsSection 39-6,193, imposing vicarious liability on owners-lessors

sections.heading: 6,193, imposing vicarious liability on owners-lessors of trucks for damages by lessees and operators of the leased trucks, is constitutional
sections.text: Bridgeford v. U-Haul Co., 195 Neb. 308, 238 N.W.2d 443 (1976).
